data.eml:eml: Taxonomic review of Inella and Strobiligera (Gastropoda: Triphoridae) from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fernandes, Maurício Romulo, Pimenta, Alexandre Dias (2019): Taxonomic review of Inella and Strobiligera (Gastropoda: Triphoridae) from Brazil. Zootaxa 4613 (1): 1-52, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4613.1.1
